description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Written in medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Glazed paper with watermark. Marginal notes. The title is written on the lower edge of the text block (illegible). Long note on fol. 377b, concerning an event in 1013 H. [1604/5]. Foliation using Arabic numerals beginning on fol. 10, up to fol. 371. Modern foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Two of the texts were copied in Cairo (Miṣr and al-Qāhirah) in 1016 (colophon text 2, fol. 371b ; text 11, fol. 405b) by Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad (fol. 405b ; on fol. 377b : Aḥmad). The date of completion of the copy of the Kitāb al-Miṣbāḥ is given according to three different calendars (see fol. 371b).
author: Qurṭubī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, -1273
abstract: Volume comprising the Arabic dictionary of al-Qurṭubī and various shorter texts concerning mainly lexicography, written by the same hand.
contents: 1. fol. 1b-7b : Tuḥfah wafīyah bi-maʻānī ḥurūf al-ʻarabīyah / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣafāqisī.
2. fol. 8a-371b : Kitāb al-Miṣbāḥ fī al-Jamʻ bayna al-Afʻāl wa-al-Ṣiḥāḥ / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Qurṭubī.
3. fol. 372b-375b : Kitāb al-abnīyah / ʻAlī ibn Jaʻfar Ibn al-Qaṭṭāʻ.
4. fol. 372b-373a (margin) : Dībājat [Kitāb al-]Afʻāl / ʻAlī ibn Jaʻfar Ibn al-Qaṭṭāʻ.
5. fol. 373a (margin) : [Excerpts] / Jaʻfar ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abi ʻAmr al-Sulamī.
6. fol. 375b-376a : [Excerpts from al-Kāmil] / Muḥammad ibn Yazīd al-Thumālī, known as al-Mubarrad.
7. fol. 376a : Tartīb Kitāb al-ʻAyn / Khalīl ibn Aḥmad.
8. fol. 376b : Fī Awqāt ṭulūʻ manāzil al-qamar / ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Sharaf al-Dīn al-Ḥumuwī, known as Ibn Qrnāṣ.
9. fol. 376b-377b : Hādhihi al-alfāẓ allatī dhakara-hā Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Barrī ibn ʻAbd al-Jabbār al-Naḥwī al-muṣdir bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-ʻatīq bi-Miṣr / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Barrī.
10. fol. 378a : [Excerpts from the Nihāyat of Ibn al-Athīr, the Ṣiḥāḥ of al-Jawharī, etc.].
11a. fol. 378b : [Title page of the Abnīyat Kitāb Sibawayhi, and biography of the author from the Wafayāt al-aʻyān of Ibn Khallikān].
11b. fol. 379b-405b : Abnīyat Kitāb Sibawayh / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Ishbīlī.

12. fol. 406a : [Excerpts in verse and prose from the Kitāb Natāʼij al-ādāb by ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ... al-Ḥusaynī, known as Daftarkhān, the Mayiz al-Diyāḥī by ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Sakhāwī [ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, d. 1245], al-Damāmīnī, Ādāb [al-mulūk] by [ʻAbd al-Malik] Thaʻālibī [d. 1037/8], al-Arbaʻīn by al-Bukhārī in al-Sāhir fī al-islām, al-Wāsiṭī].
13. fol. 406b-407b : Fī al-farq bayna al-wasaṭ al-mutaḥarrik al-awsaṭ wa-al-wasṭ al-sakin / lil-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn Barrī.
14. fol. 408a-416a : [Excerpts in verse and prose on lexicography from al-Naṭanzī, ʻAbd Allāh al-Ṭabalāwī, etc.].
extent: 416, i leaves : paper ; 234 x 164 (162 x 89) mm. bound to 235 x 170 mm.

title.@value: al-Misbāḥ fī al-Jamʻ bayna al-Afʻāl wa-al-Ṣiḥāḥ fī al-lughah ... [etc.].

dlme_title_ara_latn: al-Misbāḥ fī al-Jamʻ bayna al-Afʻāl wa-al-Ṣiḥāḥ fī al-lughah ... [etc.].
provenance: Ownership statement on fol. 1a, in the name of Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jawharī, dated 1276 H. [1859/60] ; the same name appears on fol. 9a and 202a. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, 1900, from the books of Amīn ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ḥulwānī al-Madanī al-Ḥanafī (Medina).
dlme_provenance_en: Ownership statement on fol. 1a, in the name of Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jawharī, dated 1276 H. [1859/60] ; the same name appears on fol. 9a and 202a. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, 1900, from the books of Amīn ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ḥulwānī al-Madanī al-Ḥanafī (Medina).
creator: Qurṭubī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, -1273
قرطبي، محمد بن احمد
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Upper and lower covers, fore-edge flap and envelope flap made of brown leather over paper pasteboards. The covers have a similar outer frame consisting in blind tooled and gold painted fillets and an s-shape running pattern. Paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
